Uses of Class
assignments.Course

  • Packages that use Course 
    Package Description
    assignments
    The assignments package contains the necessary files for Assignments, Assignment Submissions, Assignment Solutions, Courses, and Grading.
    utility
    The utility package contains methods and interfaces to be used across the system as needed by many other classes.

    • Uses of Course in assignments

      Methods in assignments that return Course 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Course Assignment.getCourse()
      Add (submit) an Assignment Submission towards this Assignment.
      static Course CourseManager.getCourse(java.lang.String courseID, java.lang.String term)
      Get a course given the courseID and term
      Methods in assignments with parameters of type Course 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean CourseManager.courseIsActive(Course course)
      Determine if a course is active based on the course's semester and the current date.
      Constructors in assignments with parameters of type Course 
      Constructor and Description
      Assignment(Course course, UserFile assignmentDir, TestSuite tests, UserFile submissions, AssignmentSolution solution, int number, int submissionLimit)
      Constructor requires AssignmentSolution as parameter but AssignmentSolution requires Assignment.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Course> DBController.getAllCourses()

      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Course> DBController.getAllEnrollmentsForUser(User user)
      Get all the enrollments for a particular User based on their current active role.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
